subject: Wilson Arm Band
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
Just getting another ready. Determine what wires are needed to operate the
radio then proivide the needed voltages and throw awy the processor board.
There are only a few needed connections, power, tuning voltage, and band
change. After that just make the sweep circuit and variopus speaker drivers.
